original: Buddho nu kho na vā buddho,
analyzed: buddhaḥ nu kho na vā buddhaḥ
nayi dam iti hi iti ha
esa iva dhammaḥ yadi tāvat eva
paññā me vasumatī api na sameyya

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā sāriputto thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā sāriputto theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
